content: the **granny stitch easter basket** is a delightful timeless treasure that brings a burst of springtime joy to any home with its classic granny stitch design worked back and forth in row this charming basket is both nostalgic and stylish making it the perfect piece for easter celebrations whether you re filling it with colorful eggs sweet treats or festive decorations its sturdy yet cozy texture adds a handmade touch of warmth with detachable features this basket is perfect for year-round use this easter basket is worked with **two strands of yarn held together throughout** first we ll crochet the bottom of the basket and set it aside next we ll create the body piece by working the granny stitch back and forth in row finishing with a scalloped edge finally we ll crochet the ears and handle and finish the basket by adding a fluffy tail a video tutorial is included with the pattern crochet hook i 5 5mm -
